channel.title: Why in the fuck i wont lose ep/get good kills
channel.description: I Have 25 EP On my dragon scim pure,i risk 87k i checked what i lose if i die,it said "risked wealth 87,968" I've killed 7 people without good drop,or EP Going down,ive killed karil bowers and all..what is this shit about?

item.title: Why in the fuck i wont lose ep/get good kills
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:5, topic:316417”][quote author=Xxx9234 link=topic=412976.msg3044669#msg3044669 date=1259380347]
Your EP not dropping is a sign of your kills not risking enough coins.
(25 EP barely gets you shit btw)
[/quote]

Not really. I’ve gotten a 1.2m pk with 17 ep.[/quote]

but you get everything D:

you have to be risking 100k+ yourself btw

Read full topic
item.source: Why in the fuck i wont lose ep/get good kills

item.title: Why in the fuck i wont lose ep/get good kills
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Make sure they’re risking, and raise your EP and try again.

I’ve only been on pvp servers a few times, and the kills I get are usually 100k+, and I’m only risking about 100k each time.

Read full topic
